Delivering high-quality media, reagents, diagnostics,

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
whatWeDo.heading: Connecting Biomedical Innovation to Frontline Science
whatWeDo.description: We supply certified biomedical and diagnostic products to a range of professional institutions across the Gulf region — ensuring each facility receives the tools they need to work with precision, safety, and efficiency.

clinicalLabs.title: Clinical Laboratories
clinicalLabs.description: We provide essential microbiological media, diagnostic kits, and lab disposables tailored for clinical laboratory workflows — supporting reliable disease detection and patient care.

medicalStores.title: Medical Stores
medicalStores.description: Najah Dahabi partners with licensed medical stores to ensure access to high-demand lab essentials and diagnostic tools. Our stock is SFDA-compliant, clearly labeled, and ready for retail or bulk distribution.

diagnosticCenters.title: Diagnostic Centers
diagnosticCenters.description: We serve diagnostic labs with rapid test kits, blood collection systems, reagents, and staining solutions — enabling fast, accurate, and safe diagnosis for a variety of conditions.

researchInstitutions.title: Research Institutions
researchInstitutions.description: From universities to private R&D facilities, we support research excellence by supplying analytical-grade chemicals, reagents, and custom-prepared media — all sourced from globally certified suppliers.

whyUs.title: Why Clients Choose Us
whyUs.heading: Built on trust, precision, and a deep understanding of biomedical supply needs.
whyUs.description: Our clients choose Najah Dhahabi because we go beyond products — we deliver reliability, regulatory confidence, and scientific support. Here's what sets us apart:

sfdaCompliance.title: SFDA Compliance
sfdaCompliance.description: We strictly adhere to Saudi Food & Drug Authority (SFDA) regulations to ensure every product we supply meets the highest safety and quality standards. You receive fully certified, traceable, and approved biomedical supplies.

deliveryNetwork.title: Wide Delivery Network
deliveryNetwork.description: With operations in Khafji, Riyadh, and Dubai, we ensure fast, reliable deliveries across Saudi Arabia and the UAE. Our logistics system is built to handle urgent lab requirements with efficiency and care.

trustedBrands.title: Trusted Global Brands
trustedBrands.description: We partner exclusively with reputable international manufacturers that are ISO-certified and widely recognized in the biomedical field. Our catalog includes high-performance products backed by global trust.

specialization.title: Strategic Biomedical Specialization
specialization.description: Biomedical supply is not just a category for us — it's our core focus. Our team understands microbiological, diagnostic, and research requirements, allowing us to guide clients with unmatched expertise.

ourProducts.title: Explore Our Product Categories
ourProducts.description: Discover our globally trusted biomedical product categories, used in labs and clinics around the world.

aboutUs.title: About Najah Dhahabi
aboutUs.heading: Your link to global biomedical excellence, delivered with trust and precision.
aboutUs.description: At Najah Dhahabi, we connect leading international biomedical manufacturers with local medical institutions across Saudi Arabia and the UAE. With our headquarters in Khafji, and active branches in Riyadh and Dubai, we ensure reliable, compliant, and high-quality delivery of laboratory and diagnostic products.

contactBanner.title: Have a question? We're ready to assist.
contactBanner.description: Can't find what you're looking for? Our team can help source specialized products or create custom solutions for your specific requirements.

products.title: Our Products
products.subtitle: Comprehensive Biomedical Solutions for Laboratories, Clinics, and Research Facilities
products.description: At Najah Dhahabi, we supply a complete range of certified biomedical products sourced from trusted global manufacturers. Our catalog is tailored to meet the needs of clinical labs, diagnostic centers, pharmaceutical R&D, veterinary facilities, and food & water testing labs — all fully compliant with SFDA and international standards.

industries.title: Industries We Serve
industries.subtitle: Empowering Progress Across Laboratories, Clinics & Industry
industries.aboutText: At Najah Dhahabi, we cater to a wide spectrum of scientific and diagnostic sectors with precision-engineered biomedical products. Our portfolio supports everything from cutting-edge clinical diagnostics to environmental and food safety monitoring. We understand that every industry has unique standards, and we deliver solutions that meet global compliance, SFDA guidelines, and ISO benchmarks.
industries.heroDescription: Empowering Progress Across Laboratories, Clinics & Industry
industries.description: We serve a wide range of industries with our specialized products and services.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Leading the industry with innovation and excellence
about.description: Golden Success has been a trusted name in the industry for years, providing high-quality products and exceptional service to our clients worldwide.
about.heroDescription: Your Gateway to Reliable Biomedical Solutions
about.aboutText: Najah Dhahabi is a trusted biomedical product distributor based in Saudi Arabia and the UAE. We are committed to bridging the gap between international biomedical manufacturers and local healthcare institutions across the Gulf region. Since our establishment, our mission has been to supply laboratories and diagnostics centers with cutting-edge biomedical tools that enhance accuracy, efficiency, and compliance.

features.backedByExperience: Backed by Experience. Chosen by Professionals

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide laboratories and healthcare institutions with the highest quality biomedical products — delivered with integrity, speed, and compliance.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the preferred biomedical supplier in the GCC, fostering scientific excellence through reliable access to world-class lab products.

trustedStandards.title:
Trusted Standards.
Certified Partners
trustedStandards.description: We operate in full compliance with the Saudi Food & Drug Authority (SFDA) and engage only with approved and certified international suppliers. Our commitment to safety and quality ensures that every product delivered aligns with local and international healthcare regulations.
